Texts.Chs: ……催化剂非常重要。 应用之后，您将能够轻而易举地降解敌人的DNA。 结果是，战场上充满了融化敌人的恐怖尖叫。 为了给他们带来如此完美的优雅毁灭，你需要一个能量核心，一台浮雕装置和五个远古残卷。
Texts.Eng: ...the catalyst is that very material. After it is applied, you'll be able to simply annihilate the very DNA of your opponents. As a result, the battlefield will be riddled with the horrified screams of melting enemies. To grace them with such perfection you'll need a Unknown Reactor, an Engraved Device and five Elder Fragments.
